title: Tagai No Shoutai Wo Shiranai Danjo No Hanashi
alternative_title: A Man and a Woman Unaware of Each Other's True Identity ; 互いの正体を知らない男女の話
status: A Man and a Woman Unaware of Each Other's True Identity ; 互いの正体を知らない男女の話
description:
Description :
        They are a pair of delinquent teenagers who are both hiding their true identities. Yet, despite this, the distance between the two of them is gradually becoming closer.
